original_title: General Motors: Make Your Own Magic: World of Motion
overview: Primary produced and distributed to General Motors Employees in 1989, this VHS is a tour of Walt Disney World with a focus on the GM Sponsorship of the EPCOT Center World of Motion attraction.  As the narrator suggests: “We live in a world of endless possibilities, a world filled with so many things to see and do, we would be lost without our freedom to choose what we want to do, how and when.  At the Walt Disney World Resort, the ways to make our own kind of magic are endless, exciting worlds within worlds, a universe of sights and sounds, waiting to capture our hearts, our minds, and our imaginations….  “Now is the time for you to Make Your Own Magic”.  The video included GM employees visiting and recommending attractions at WDW.
title: General Motors: Make Your Own Magic: World of Motion
